attributes.title: YOU MANIFEST THROUGH ME FOR THE YOU IN YOU!
attributes.description:
Satsang delivered on 7th October 2019

Till you become Cosmic you, you do not rest. That is called seeking. That is your power, that is not your weakness. A man who has tasted something beautiful will not rest till he achieves that state permanently. You in you has tasted the Cosmic you, so it will not rest till it reaches the Cosmic you. It makes you come towards a being who has already tasted the Cosmic you in you. The you in you seeks the Cosmic you and makes the Cosmic you manifest in me as Cosmic you for you in you. You in you, you in the Cosmos, you in me - all the three is one and the same. This oneness is pure shuddhadvaita. Meditate on this powerful cognition.
